	author
	
	ChangeLog
	
	doc/
	
		build/
		
		make.bat
		
		MakeFile
		
		source/
		
			conf.py
			
			index.txt
			
			_static/
			
			_templates/
			
	external/
	
		lib/
		
	LICENSE
	
	projetStat/
	
		projet_stat.py
		
	Readme.txt 
	
	REVISION
